title: Africa Sustainable Livestock 2050: Biosafety and Public Health Practices in Poultry Farming in Kenya

tasks.task: Meet Winnie Wangoi, a poultry farmer
subtasks: Greet Winnie Wangoi and introduce yourself
Express interest in her role as a poultry farmer
Learn about her involvement with the FAO project

tasks.task: Discuss practices and behavior study with FAO
subtasks: Explain the FAO's interest in safeguarding public health
Highlight the adoption of practices for positive business impact
Describe the development of a checklist for biosecurity practices
Explain the checklist's role in training livestock stakeholders

tasks.task: Outline the benefits of proper practices
subtasks: Note faster gain in slaughter weight for plants

tasks.task: Address legal and procedural gaps in poultry business
subtasks: Acknowledge existing laws but mention implementation issues
Discuss the complexity of procedures and their management
